Label;Caption=Use Process Designer-based solution matching Bold=1 Caption=Use Process Designer-based solution matching Height=2 Name=label1429865849220 Width=95 X=7 Y=7

field.output: The Process Designer-based codeless Incident module uses an improved and more flexible solution matching process, which is different to solution matching in the legacy Incident module. The legacy solution matching is configured at the Incident profile level, and cannot be automatically migrated to Process Designer-based security.
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=The Process Designer-based codeless Incident module uses an improved and more flexible solution matching process, which is different to solution matching in the legacy Incident module. The legacy solution matching is configured at the Incident profile level, and cannot be automatically migrated to Process Designer-based security. Name=label1429776312599 Height=4 Name=label1429776312599 Width=180 X=7 Y=9

field.output: Select this option to use the new Process Designer-based solution matching. Note that if you want to keep using legacy solution matching, we recommend to manually migrate the solution matching configuration to Process Designer-based security. For more details please refer to the upgrade documentation.

field.property: Wlabel;Caption=The Process Designer-based Incident and Service Desk modules use different categorization tables to the SM classic modules. Height=2 Name= Width=180 X=7 Y=21

field.output: Select this option to synchronize changes in the Process Designer-based category tables back to the legacy category tables (such as category, subcategory, and product type). This is necessary if you run reports on legacy category tables or if interfaces rely on data in these legacy tables. For more details please refer to the upgrade documentation.
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=Select this option to synchronize changes in the Process Designer-based category tables back to the legacy category tables (such as category, subcategory, and product type).
